data.text: @norfolkbookworm Everybody I know who has had it the last 6 months or so has been really mild. My colleague had it last week and no symptoms. So 🤞🤞 youâ€™ll be mild too x
@jaybee2801 Thank you, thanks to the vaccines it doesn't feel quite as scary as when you caught it back at the start of the pandemic but with an already wonky brain I'm a bit nervous.
@norfolkbookworm @PeirenePress @KateHandheld @NorfolkLibs Oh no. I hope you are ok and your symptoms stay mild x
@norfolkbookworm @PeirenePress @KateHandheld @NorfolkLibs Snuggle with a book or three and get better soon.
@norfolkbookworm @PeirenePress @KateHandheld Sorry to hear this. Thank goodness for books!
@norfolkbookworm @PeirenePress @KateHandheld @NorfolkLibs I'm so sorry. Cases are rising so much around here.
